description:
The first of July, Kortrijk (Belgian city) will present its iBeacon powered touristic tour, the biggest permanent deployment in Belgium.
After the press conference (17:00, 10 seats available), we will have an informal meetup (18:00-20:00).

Agenda:
17:00 Press conference (10 seats for Beacon Lovers)
18:00 Informal meetup
name: Launch touristic tour + informal meetup
